storyInfo: Kal'tsit finds her hiding spot ambushed by a team of Sarkaz mercenaries. A disastrous battle is unavoidable.

attributes.content: 22 Years Ago
8:05 P.M. \ Cloudy
Central Sargon, Ibut Region, Town of Reefsteep, Surroundings
An abandoned courtyard... Is this where you live?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: A few years ago, a merchant built the magnificent courtyard before you, but he disappeared without a trace during a business trip. To this day, no one knows whether he met his fate in a natural Catastrophe or man-made tragedy.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: But whichever the case, this courtyard has become a place of refuge for those of us with nowhere to go.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Old Isin brought two new faces with him...
attributes.name: Homeless Person

attributes.content: She doesn't seem all that poor, going by her looks...
attributes.name: Homeless Person

attributes.content: We need to be careful... Let's head back inside. We shouldn't pry into Old Isin's secrets.
attributes.name: Disheveled Person

attributes.content: What's this courtyard called...?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (Sargonian) 'The Sleeping Sargon.' That's what all those without a home have come to call this place...
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Just like our fallen homeland, my lady. We sleep on the most extravagant corpse you can find in the whole world.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Please stay the night and wait until sunrise. Only then can we leave for the heart of Reefsteep.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: The land encircled by reefs.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Precisely... Right in the center of the sea of sands.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: The padishah and lord ameer chose to rebuild their city somewhere with far richer resources, leaving it a forgotten ruin, a land of lawlessness.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Be that as it may, to those who once lived in that city as well as their descendants, leaving that place behind is easier said than done.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You can hire underground Messengers to do your bidding there. They will create fake identities for you and help you leave Sargon territory.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: However, your destination is quite some distance away. Old Isin cannot guarantee you will arrive in one piece.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: How is Elliot doing?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: He is asleep, but it is safe here. You care for him more than Old Isin imagined you would. It is proof of your kindness.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: He's not going to be happy if he catches you say that.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Oh, Old Isin can see it... The anger lurking in him.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: I thought you'd have met plenty of people like him. Civil unrests and skirmishes happen often in Sargon, after all.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The world may think there are many brave men with a lust for revenge, but there isn't. Most merely drown in their hatred, their rationality quashed by their anger.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: I can save him this once, and only this once.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Yes... Old Isin understands... His fate lies elsewhere... and his fate is bound to that gold coin of yours.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Why 22 years?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Arts cannot give us so-called prophecies, and no mere mortal can manipulate time. Time is the mother of all fates. All Old Isin likes to do is to wager against time.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: So you mean... Hm, what's wrong?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (Dissatisfied hisses)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Ah... What a beautiful creature.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Old Isin can tell. The two of you depend on one another. Old Isin can tell... it is your partner.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: The two of you have traveled a long, long journey together.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Let's go, Mon3tr. Let's go see them.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Oh... You communicate... Your hearts are connected.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Old Isin can feel that... you have complete trust in this creature... as though it is your one and only friend...
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Yet... you traveled on your long, arduous journey with no one but this beautiful creature...?
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Lady, is this glory of yours replete with nothing but loneliness?
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Loneliness doesn't affect my responsibilities in any way...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It seems we've got company. I'll go take care of them. Please stay here. Take care of Elliot.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Of course. Old Isin has ways to hide. After all, Old Isin has been hiding for far too long.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Where's Kal'tsit?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Enemies are abound. She is fending them off with her trusted partner.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: You mean that weird creature...
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Why are you looking into the distance like that? Are you worried about her?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: No, Old Isin is not worried. She has a tenacious spirit. Old Isin thinks not even death can stop her in her tracks, that's why Old Isin respects her. Old Isin has a question for her...
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: What do you want to ask her...?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: For the past hundred and some years... Old Isin has had the same dream again and again.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: In those dreams, there stands a magnificent city among the golden sands. The city moves, and the sky seen from its towers is purer and clearer than ever...
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: The young pasha stands next to Old Isin, and there is always a vast, empty swath of land before our eyes. The young padishah would always begin to recount to Old Isin...
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: Yet Old Isin is too old... Old Isin forgets. Old Isin's crimes are unforgivable.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: (He's talking to himself again...)
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Old Isin has always sought this answer. Old Isin has been waiting for someone who knows of the city and its glory.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: All those who had to do with the city yet live in the dream. Some have forgotten, but a great many of us still look back fondly on our homeland...
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: We built this city with our own hands under the padishah's leadership. A great city. Even if Catastrophes bring it to its ruins, that city is the true beginning of the Land of Reefsteep...
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: The Sargonians of Ibut must never forget anything about Reefsteep... yet... Old Isin has forgotten... Old Isin is unforgivable.
attributes.name: Old Isin

attributes.content: You've been waiting for someone... to tell you what you've forgotten in your dreams?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.text: The old fortune teller turns around, his smell ever rotten. His facial features are strange, and his bare fingers certainly do not resemble his actual age.

attributes.content: (Roars)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: You're the leader of those squads... I remember you.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: How did you find us, Columbian?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Sarkaz... I'm not from Columbia.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (Sarkaz Tribal Dialect)
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Hmm—?!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: What's going on... Are you trying to control my mind?!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Fire! Stop her Arts.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: (Sarkaz Tribal Dialect)
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (Shrieks)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: What...? Not even the highest grade arrows could harm that monster?!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: We don't have enough info to work with... She seems to be a Caster. Be careful!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Sarkaz... The Lord Ameer of Ibut hired you, didn't he?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You think I'm about to tell you?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: No... The Ibuti Lord Ameer has a deep, personal grudge against Victoria. I only got a brief glimpse, so it's possible I'm mistaken, but the arrows just now were indeed Victorian.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Looks like your real employer... The current padishah, Murad, is far more crafty than I expected.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: A patient ruler, fanning the flames between the different forces without a care in the world. Perhaps he had anticipated the plans of the Columbians and the local lords ameer all along?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Heh, you know about the padishah, and still you dare come to Sargon? I'll never know what's going on in you Columbians' heads. What, you got Originium in your brain?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Padishah Murad wants just the box and nothing else. Give it to us, and all of us get to leave this place alive.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: You haven't destroyed it, have you?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Only because it isn't mine.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Heh... You're a stubborn one.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: The Ibuti Lord Ameer's self-righteousness earned him the padishah's anger. I have no idea who hired those Columbian mercenaries, but I can at least tell you they won't be putting up a fight anymore.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: This pointless war is coming to an end soon. Padishah Murad gave us the authority to bring all this to an end.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: If that were the case, why would an almighty Sargon padishah hire mercenaries to do his bidding here, instead of sending his personal guards?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: This has got way too much to do with Columbia, after all, but none of that matters to you and me right now. You got a decision to make here, Operations Adviser.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: All you gotta know is that there's no one coming to save you in this desert.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: (Lightly stretches body)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: (Watch out for that creature. No idea what it actually is, but it's gonna be tricky to take it down.)
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: (Sarkaz Tribal Dialect)
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You—
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: —No, it can't be! This isn't just normal Arts—
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Devil speak? You're a Columbian! How—
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: (Sargonian) Enough!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: (Sargonian) Talk to us in Victorian or Sargonian, or else we'll shoot!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Are you from Kazdel?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Kazdel...?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Just a bedtime story for kids. I have no idea what you have to do with Sarkaz, but this doesn't change anything about the situation we're in.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Be quick with it and hand the box over. All the padishah wants is the tech.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: This will set off the beginning of Sargon's destruction. Padishah Murad is not a scientist. He doesn't understand the devastation it can cause.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: He doesn't need to understand, nor do we.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Is Sargon your homeland, Sarkaz?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I've lived in Sargon for as long as I can remember.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: We snuck around in the back alleys and hid our horns, and we lived in the filthiest of places.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Picking up arms is the only way we get to eat. It's simple. All of us are practically natural-born Infected. It's do or die, and that's what drives us.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Tsk—So what are you saying?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Only Sarkaz with a firm will can escape the ancient language's influence. The language itself is a kind of Sarkaz witchery. What's the source of your conviction? Your mission, or your greed?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Well, I gotta admit... Your mind trick might actually have worked. I still haven't ordered anyone to open fire. I'm still chitchatting with you with all the patience in the world, even.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: All I can see before me is a Sarkaz trying his best to survive using the simplest method he knows.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (Looks around on alert)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Enough of this crap. I thought you were a Columbian mercenary leader. Stop pussyfooting around!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Padishah Murad won't allow any Sarkaz to know his dirtiest secrets.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You fought off all the other squads vying for this trophy. Don't you suppose the lords ameer's men were not among them, masquerading as mercenaries?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: And between the exorbitant amounts in taxes and the lives of a few Sarkaz assassins, what do you think Padishah Murad's choice will be?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Of course we're aware of that, but if we let you go now, does that mean we'll be raking in even more dough, or our Oripathy will be cured right away?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Don't get the wrong idea. We live at the padishah's mercy. We don't have a choice.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Perhaps I can give you a choice.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (Sarkaz Tribal Dialect)
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Hmph—You want to turn us against him, and you want us to serve—
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: —Serve Kazdel... a place we haven't so much as seen...?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Don't make me laugh, Caster! The Sarkaz homeland? There's nothing there but a bunch of ruins! You bookworm types should know better than any of us just how much is left of Kazdel!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: (Get the Casters ready. Focus your fire on that monster. You two, we'll take the bitch down the first opportunity we got.)
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Too bad. Looks like negotiation's not on the table anymore.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: This isn't even negotiation—Tsk, what is this even, mercy? You're the one who's surrounded right now!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Yeah, you're right... You know how to strike fear, but if we don't give the padishah an answer he's satisfied with by tomorrow, we aren't going to escape death either.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Just like I told you, we don't have a choice.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Open fire!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: What's that behind the smoke...? Is that the monster?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Not even a scratch...?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: You, 'Kazdel' Caster. What are you?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: You didn't have to be someone else's tool.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I want to live.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Besides, this is how it's always been. A Sarkaz has no right to dream about the future.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Draw your blades! Attack!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary
